description: The remains of two men are uncovered at a villa on the outskirts of the ancient Roman city.
title: Pompeii: Dig uncovers remains of rich man and slave killed by Vesuvius
title_page: Pompeii: Dig uncovers remains of rich man and slave killed by Vesuvius - BBC News
maintext: The other man was aged between 18 and 23. Officials at the archaeological site said crushed vertebrae indicated that he was a slave who did manual labour.
